ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND(NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,'System Admin')), OR($RecordType.Name='HNBF Opportunity Record Type', $RecordType.Name='HNBF Opportunity DSA Record Type'), Probability >= 0.80, ISBLANK(TEXT(Send_to_H_B_Implementation__c)), Opportunity_Owner_Sales_Org__c = 'HNBF', NOT(ISPICKVAL(OpportunityType__c,'ESR')), NOT(ISPICKVAL(OpportunityType__c,'ERTC')), NOT(ISPICKVAL(OpportunityType__c,'BeneTrac Gold')), NOT(ISPICKVAL(OpportunityType__c,'BeneTrac Platinum')), NOT(ISPICKVAL(OpportunityType__c,'Individual Insurance')), NOT(ISPICKVAL(OpportunityType__c,'MPP Beta')), NOT(ISPICKVAL(OpportunityType__c,'PBA')), NOT(ISPICKVAL(OpportunityType__c,'Standalone FBAE')), NOT(ISPICKVAL(OpportunityType__c,'Standalone POP'))
)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You must populate the Send to H&B Implementation field before moving to 80%
